mapper.select:
select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_email as memberEmail, member_name as memberName, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_birth as memberBirth, postcode, address_road as addressRoad, address_detail as addressDetail, member_consent as memberConsent, profile_path as profilePath, profile_intro as profileIntro, certificate_path as certificatePath, member_level as memberLevel, member_point as memberPoint, enroll_date as enrollDate, withdraw_date as withdrawDate, member_black as memberBlack, (select count(*) from freeboard where free_writer = member_id)freeCount, (select count(*) from recipe_board where recipe_writer = member_no)recipeCount, (select count(*) from freeboard_comment where fc_writer = member_id)fcCount
from member where memberBlack = 0

select count(*) from (select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_email as memberEmail, member_name as memberName, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_birth as memberBirth, postcode, address_road as addressRoad, address_detail as addressDetail, member_consent as memberConsent, profile_path as profilePath, profile_intro as profileIntro, certificate_path as certificatePath, member_level as memberLevel, member_point as memberPoint, enroll_date as enrollDate, withdraw_date as withdrawDate, member_black as memberBlack, (select count(*) from freeboard where free_writer = member_id)boardCount, (select count(*) from recipe_board where recipe_writer = member_no)recipeCount, (select count(*) from freeboard_comment where fc_writer = member_id)fcCount
from member order by enrollDate desc) where memberBlack = #{level}
and ${searchType} like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
and
boardCount
recipeCount
fcCount
(enrollDate
>= #{searchText2}
<= #{searchText2}
between #{joinStart} and #{joinEnd})
and (memberLevel =1 or memberLevel =2)
and memberLevel =1
and memberLevel =2
and memberLevel = 4
and memberLevel = 5

select * from (select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_email as memberEmail, member_name as memberName, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_birth as memberBirth, postcode, address_road as addressRoad, address_detail as addressDetail, member_consent as memberConsent, profile_path as profilePath, profile_intro as profileIntro, certificate_path as certificatePath, member_level as memberLevel, member_point as memberPoint, enroll_date as enrollDate, withdraw_date as withdrawDate, member_black as memberBlack, (select count(*) from freeboard where free_writer = member_id)boardCount, (select count(*) from recipe_board where recipe_writer = member_no)recipeCount, (select count(*) from freeboard_comment where fc_writer = member_id)fcCount
from member) where ${searchType} like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
mapper.update: update member set member_black = 1 where member_no in #{memberNo}

update member set member_black = 0
where member_no in #{memberNo}
mapper.delete: delete from member where member_no in #{memberNo}
mapper.update:
update member set member_level = 2
where member_no in #{memberNo}
update member set member_point = 0 where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_email as memberEmail, member_name as memberName, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, member_birth as memberBirth, postcode, address_road as addressRoad, address_detail as addressDetail, member_consent as memberConsent, profile_path as profilePath, profile_intro as profileIntro, certificate_path as certificatePath, member_level as memberLevel, member_point as memberPoint, enroll_date as enrollDate, withdraw_date as withdrawDate, member_black as memberBlack from member where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.insert:
insert into member values(member_seq.nextval,#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberEmail},#{memberName},#{memberNickname},#{memberPhone},#{memberBirth},#{postcode},#{addressRoad},#{addressDetail},#{memberConsent},'profile_basic.png',null,null,1,0,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),null,0)
select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}

insert into member values(member_seq.nextval,#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberEmail},#{memberName},#{memberNickname},#{memberPhone},#{memberBirth},#{postcode},#{addressRoad},#{addressDetail},#{memberConsent},'profile_basic.png',null,#{certificatePath},4,0,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),null,0)
select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.update: update member set member_pw=#{memberPw} where member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_email as memberEmail, member_name as memberName, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_phone as memberPhone, postcode, address_road as addressRoad, address_detail as addressDetail, member_point as memberPoint from member where member_no=#{memberNo}
select member_no as memberNo from member where member_nickname=#{selectUser}
select member_nickname as memberNickname from member where member_no=#{receiveNo}
mapper.update:
update member set member_level = 6
where member_no in #{memberNo}
mapper.delete: delete from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_pw=#{memberPw}
mapper.update: update member set member_level=5 where member_Id=#{memberId} and member_pw=#{memberPw}
mapper.select: select member.member_no as memberNo,member.member_id as memberId,recipe_no as recipeNo,recipe_title as recipeTitle, report_comment as reportComment from recipe_report join recipe_board using(recipe_no) join member on (recipe_writer = member.member_no) where member_black =0 and rownum <=5
